about_the_game:
About the Demo

The Twisted Tower demo starts you on the beach of the Twisted Tower, and takes you through the first couple of floors of the haunting tower. You'll encounter 4 twisted enemies, 3 unique weapons (along with their secondary fire capabilities), and a handful of characters to meet as you make your way through the haunting, twisting park.

About Twisted Tower

Step right up to the Twisted Tower, the world-famous resort for all ages!

Careful though! It's been a decade since we’ve welcomed a single guest, so our silly mascots may be looking for a hug, and our carnival rides might need some screws tightened…

So what do you say, chap? Are you tough enough to make it to the top of the tower and win that incredible prize of £10,000,000?

And don’t forget… we’re all watchin’. Even the beautiful Charlotte, the love of your life…

Here’s what your ticket will get you upon entering the magical resort:

  • Explore an abandoned 1950’s resort reminiscent of BioShock and Disney World

  • Get lost in 5 hauntingly beautiful levels: the hotel, the waterpark, the clown casino, the carnival forest, and the fairy-tale castle

  • Punchy, bloody gunplay with corrupted fairy-tale mascots

  • Immerse yourself in a mysterious and emotional story

  • Choose from dozens of unique paths, ensuring the game is unique and fresh for every player!

  • Upgrade your toyish arsenal, including: a whack-a mole mallet, rubber-band pistol, dart throwin’ Tommy Gun, fartin’ shotgun, bubblegum spittin’ chain-gun, sniper slingshot, skull-poppin’ magical wand, and more

  • Collect bizarre toys to assist you in jumping, dashing, and grappling your way up the tower

content_descriptors.notes: Contains violence gore/blood splatter related to shooting and killing enemies/monstrous creatures.

name: Twisted Tower Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 Or Later
  • Processor: 2.4GHZ Dual Core Processor Or Higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GT Or Equivalent
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit Recommended, 32-bit Supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Welcome to the Twisted Tower demo! Blast your way through an abandoned theme park crawling with fairy-tale mascots, twisted puzzles, and deadly traps. Uncover the dark secrets of your past as you race to the top to win the prize and the love of your life.
